languages.text: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: Обладатель посоха (уровень 12) получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Видение смерти. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значение {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. Противники получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при любых проверках сопротивляемости {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилам{/g} телепатии, которые применяет обладатель посоха. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

traits.locale_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the damage of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Обладатель посоха (уровень 12) получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Видение смерти. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значение урона от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. Противники получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при любых {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверках сопротивляемости{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилам{/g} телепатии, которые применяет обладатель посоха. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

Обладатель посоха (уровень 12) получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Видение смерти. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. languages.text: 这根法杖（力量等级12）的使用者获得死亡幻象{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。当使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，受影响的敌人在检定中会承受−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 这根法杖（力量等级12）的使用者获得死亡幻象{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的伤害。当使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抗性检定{/g}时，受影响的敌人在检定中会承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

languages.text: この杖（パワーレベル12）の使い手は死のビジョン{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}でも使用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に影響を及ぼす。敵は、使い手が使用するテレパシー規律の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}に対するすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗力判定{/g}に−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+15増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+10増加
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: クルダラッハの杖（パワーレベル12）を装備すると死のビジョン{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得。同アビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}でも使用可能。パワーレベルはこのパワーのダメージに作用する。敵のテレパシー規律の{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}に対するすべての抵抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に対し、{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−10を付与。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}+10

languages.text: El personaje que utilice este báculo (nivel de poder 12) obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Visión de muerte. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de este poder. Los enemigos sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 en todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas{/g} de fortaleza contra {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} de la disciplina telepatía usados por el portador. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: El personaje que utilice este báculo (nivel de poder 12) obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Visión de muerte. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al daño de este poder. Los enemigos sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 en todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de fortaleza contra {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} de la disciplina telepatía usados por el portador. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

languages.text: Der Führer dieses Stabes (Energiestufe 12) erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Todesvision. Diese Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Feinde haben einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} der Telepathie-Disziplin, die vom Träger eingesetzt werden. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Der Führer dieses Stabes (Kraftstufe 12) erlangt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Todesvision. Diese Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Kraftstufe beeinflusst den von dieser Kraft zugefügten Schaden. Feinde erleiden einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} der Telepathie-Disziplin, die vom Führer eingesetzt werden. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton (niveau de puissance 12) bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Vision de mort. Des versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Le niveau de puissance détermine les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par ce pouvoir. Les ennemis subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 pour tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests{/g} de résistance aux {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} de la discipline de télépathie de l'utilisateur. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

Le niveau de puissance détermine les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par ce pouvoir. Les ennemis subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 pour tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests{/g} de résistance aux {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} de la discipline de télépathie de l'utilisateur. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: Bu asayı (güç seviyesi 12) kullanan kişi, Ölüm Tasavvuru {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Bu kabiliyetin ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} hâlleri de mevcuttur. Güç seviyesi, bu gücün vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} da etki eder. Düşmanlar, asayı taşıyanın kullandığı ve telepati disiplinine ait {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerine{/g} karşı yapacakları tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testleri{/g} için −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
